channel.title: CVE Feed for gnutls -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for gnutls -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-3836|2024-08-04T19:19:18.612Z -- gnutls -- gnutls
item.description: It was discovered in gnutls before version 3.6.7 upstream that there is an uninitialized pointer access in gnutls versions 3.6.3 or later which can be triggered by certain post-handshake messages.

item.title: CVE-2019-3829|2024-08-04T19:19:18.605Z -- gnutls -- gnutls
item.description: A vulnerability was found in gnutls versions from 3.5.8 before 3.6.7. A memory corruption (double free) vulnerability in the certificate verification API. Any client or server application that verifies X.509 certificates with GnuTLS 3.5.8 or later is affected.
